title: AT dj night pmo icl 🥀🥀🥀
content: Bro they told ts gonna start at 4.45. it's 5.30 and there ain't a single sign of them even letting us in any time soon like be so fr rn I ain't trynna stand here in da crowd and lose all the mysterious aura 🥀🥀🥀and energy I got fr. Nah but real note why the fuck r they so bad at starting shit on time all the fucking time man like it really makes me feel drained just waiting for events I paid for lowkey man

comments.body: Why do they call it dj "night"  they wrap it around it 8🍠
Bro last time shaan concert i used every ounce of my energy and patience till i got inside the ground and then lost it when they didn't start asap and just dipped 💔💔💔💔
